title: The Ingrate
creator_credit: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
brief_description: A young bank clerk’s love for the daughter of the bank’s president proves to be a dilemma which eventually turns into a disaster for one and all. Cast includes Herbert Yost, Florence Lawrence, Arthur V. Johnson.
creator_credit_for_label: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
